notes.logo_requirement: Ensure 'Mister DJ' logo is visible on all generated banners, either on equipment, signage, watermark, or integrated into the scene
notes.image_format: 1080x1080px square for Instagram feed, 1080x1920px for Stories
notes.call_to_action: Always include clear CTA in caption and image
notes.engagement_strategy: Mix of promotional (50%), educational (25%), and community (25%) content
